nodes.text: Muffins were a type of small, beige food. They could be cooked in an oven. A muffin variant called Muja muffins made from Muja fruit originated on the planet Gala. They were favored by the Daan faction. The restaurant Dex's Diner served "Hungry Hutt" breakfast sandwiches made with another variant of muffins, pedunkee mufkins, prior to its destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's reign. Muffins were often made from the fruit of a marble-berry plant.
In 3 ABY, Noa Briqualon made some muffins in his Endor hut, which were enjoyed by Cindel Towani, Teek and Wicket Wystri Warrick.
